mng: auspicious, propitious, good luck, felicity, euphoria, used for 旗, e.g. in 旗袍, long Chinese dress
propitious, felicitous, euphoria, used for 旗, e.g. in 旗袍, long Chinese dress

exm.mng: business is auspicious, conventional greeting at the foot of a letter: May your business go well!
Duan Qirui (1864-1936), commander of Beiyang Army under Yuan Shikai, then politician and powerful warlord
